about_the_game:
Heart-friendly horror

In this game, which places importance on narrative elements, jump scares are kept to a minimum to allow you to experience the solemn worldview. Instead, the thrills are more than enough.

An unconventional puzzle

An "inventory puzzle" inspired by the knapsack problem stands in your way. In this world, all items are puzzle pieces! Explore the mansion in search of pieces! However, beware of the ghosts that appear in the mansion...

Fight the approaching fear with Iaido-slash!

When you encounter a ghost "Fallen Samurai" wandering around the samurai mansion, a battle begins. To fend off your opponent, you must "materialize" the invisible spirit of the fallen samurai, and while watching for an opening in your opponent's mind, perform an Iaido-slash to drive away the evil spirit! Blow away the tension that has hardened with fear with the exhilarating feeling of Iaido-slash!

short_description: Slash or be slashed. Protect yourself from vengeful spirits with the sword you picked up while approaching the mystery hidden in the mansion. A Japanese-style puzzle action and metafiction mystery horror game with an unusual "inventory puzzle" and sword "parry counter" features!
